file_content.text: The Kaggath continues, and there will be blood in the streets.
The report must reach Lord Shalath.
Such a distinguished group. Might I ask a moment of your time?
My lord, might I beg a favor?
Agent. The Dark Council requires a small but important task from you.
You. The Dark Council requires your services. You will be compensated appropriately.
This report from the Dark Council must reach Lord Shalath at her research camp in the jungle.
Unfortunately, Lord Shalath has declared a Kaggath against my master and his entire power base. Meaning should I appear in her sight, my life is forfeit.
What exactly is a "Kaggath"?
A Kaggath?
A Sith affair, that tends to end with the death of a great many people on both sides.
I'm not familiar with this particular Sith tradition.
A Kaggath?
The Kaggath is rarely invoked. Two lords wage war through their power bases until one lord lies dead. The dead lord's power base is then purged.
You understand my hesitation to throw myself in the line of fire. Please, my lord.
A weak, cowardly Sith who fears his betters. I hope your lord has better followers as well.
So you are scared.
As you will, my lord. Still, the Dark Council requires Lord Shalath get this information. Please, my lord.
So this Kaggath means you can't deliver the report?
You need me to go?
Exactly. But still I try to do as my master bids and as the Dark Council requires. You will do the same.
Take this report to Maraad, Lord Shalath's apprentice. He is a reasonable man and will make sure she sees the Dark Council's will.
I must return to my master and make preparations.
I don't want to get involved in this sort of thing.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
I don't blame you, really.
I really don't know what they expect of me.
